original_text: But he answered and said unto them, An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign; and there shall no sign be given to it, but the sign of the prophet Jonas:
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 악하고 음란한 세대가 표적을 구하나 선지자 요나의 표적 밖에는 보일 표적이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: But he answered and said unto them
An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign
and there shall no sign be given to it
sentences.korean_translation: 그것에게는 아무 표적도 주어지지 아니할 것이

sentences.original_text: but the sign of the prophet Jonas
